title: [Plains of Bone, Outer Circle]
description: Orc skulls dangle from chains hanging from rusted bars protruding from the outer wall.  One of the bars has come loose and now tilts downward.  Dried wax from now dormant candles drips from the skulls like the drool that did when the creature was alive, while fresh wax drips from now burning candles.

Orc skulls dangle from chains hanging from rusted bars protruding from the outer wall.  One of the bars has come loose and now tilts downward.  Dried wax from now dormant candles drips from the skulls like the drool that did when the creature was alive.
